initial_question.title: When I use the parameter npercent=1 to quantize the model, I have the following problem：
initial_question.body:
/VPTQ/vptq/vptq.py", line 443, in get_error
    weight = weight.reshape(qweight.shape)
RuntimeError: shape '[3584, 3548]' is invalid for input of size 12845056

satisfaction_conditions: Vector length parameters must be properly configured for the outlier quantization
Quantization configuration must properly handle outlier allocation
